content: stitches row 1 needle 1 k#3 k4 k#3 k12/14/16 k#3 k4 k#3 do not turn work needle 2 k24/26/28 row 2 needle 1 sl1 k4 sl1 k12/14/16 sl1 k4 sl1 4 gusset set up needle 2 k24/26/28 pick up and knit 13/14/15 side seam stitches pm row 3 needle 1 c3f c3b k 12/14/16 c3f c3b starting with row 1 of stitch pattern knit stitch needle 2 k24/26/28 pattern over next 24/26/28 stitches instep pm repeat these 3 row 11 more times 12 pattern repeats in total or until you have your desired leg pick up and knit 13/14/15 side seam stitches k to bor length 64/ 70/ 74 stitches total needle count 3 heel flap over needle 2 with ws facing you 5 gusset decrease row 1 row 1 sl1 * p across row turn k to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 sm stitch row 2 *sl1 k1* across row turn pattern over the next 24/26/28 stitches instep sm row 3 sl1 * p across row turn k1 ssk k to bor row 4 sl2 *k1 sl1 * across row ending with k2 turn row 2 repeat these 4 row according to size k to marker sm stitch pattern over next 24/26/28 size 1 5 more times 24 row stitches sm k to bor size 2 5 mores times repeat row 1 and 2 once more repeat row 1 and 2 7/8/8 more times until you have 26 row size 3 6 more times 28 row 48/52/56 on your needles ©kellie a macpherson @myknittedwardrobe / kellieaine@gmail com page 2 of 3 6 foot keep bor marker only rearrange stitches 24/26/28 per needle row 1 needle 1 24/26/28 instep in stitch pattern needle 2 k24/26/28 sole stitches continue with row 1 ending 5cm before desired foot length finish with pattern row 3 needle 1 only on needle 2 knit 12/13/14 remove marker k12/13/14 place marker for new bor 7 toe - 5cm toe length 5cms over 17 row size 1 row 1 k to end of round row 2 *k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1* to end of round row 3 k to end of round knit row 1 3 two more times 9 row in total 18 stitches per needle knit row 2 & 3 three times 6 row 12 stitches per needle knit row 2 two more times 2 row 8 stitches per needle size 2/3 row 1 k to end of round row 2 *k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1* end of round knit row 1 and 2 seven more times 16 row in total 10/12 stitches per needle knit row 2 one more time 8 /10 stitches per needle finishing cut yarn leaving a tail long enough to weave through stitches with a tapestry needle use kitchener technique to close toe weave in ends make one more ©laid edges 2020 by kellie a macpherson all rights reserved for personal use only ©kellie a macpherson @myknittedwardrobe / kellieaine@gmail com page
